__e: So I saved his skin, and you're here to save ours, that right?
How many times did I save that kid from breaking his neck?
They don't seem to care about your hide.
Aside from saving your ass... you have no idea what I've protected you from.
Is there anything in the world you wouldn't do to save your skin?
I'll help you get to a doctor, but I ain't about to walk into no knife for you.
You found another fast one to get you here in time to save my neck.
You're asking me to break the law, risk my neck, and you're asking me to put in the dark all the people that love me and trust me.
I got something only the Fleece can revive.
I may not look like a fairy godmother, Tommy, but... looks can be deceiving.
The beautiful Rosalee, who proves that beauty is but skin deep and that a beast resides within us all.
At the first light of day... while Octavian's glow still lights up the sky... we will attack.
I, for one, do not intend to go to sleep... by the light of a Communist moon.

Most of the time when the hide's pulled off, either that will open up the abscess and the the pus will come out, or if it's deep-seated, when the inspectors are doing their work or the company employees, they might stick their knife into an abscess, and it explodes all over the place.
Skin's real pink when you get down to it.
While he searches for the fleece, he's at the ends of the earth.
